meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>year</kanji> <kanji>approximate</kanji> is your <vocabulary>approximate age</vocabulary>. This is also an indirect way to refer to <vocabulary>adolescence</vocabulary>, and when people reach <vocabulary>marriageable age</vocabulary>!
readingMnemonic: The reading is the reading of the vocab version of 年 plus 頃, put together. Note: You will also sometimes see this written partially in kana like 年ごろ.
